e: ￹`O~ `maan~ `a~ `sa'opo~ `konini~?￺What kind of a gathering is this?￻這是什麼聚會？
d.f: ￹￺to gather * of people or things￻集合，人或物

e: ￹`Sa~`'opoen~ `ako~ `ko~ `wawa~.￺I will gather the children together (lead them or call together).￻我要召集兒童
￹`Pasa~`'opoen~ `ako~ `ko~ `wawa~.￺I will (have someone go) gather the children.￻我要 (差某人) 把兒童集合起來
￹`Papi~`sa'opo~`en~ `ko~ `singsi~ `to~ `wawa~.￺Have the teacher gather the children together.￻請 (告訴) 老師把兒童召集在一起
￹`Sa~`'opoen~ `ko~ `ni~`ala~`an~ `namo~ `a~ `foting~.￺Gather together the fish you caught.￻把你們捉來的魚集中在一起

d.f: ￹￺biblical term for church￻聖經指教會的聚會
